data.message:
A few days over here asked me what to inspire me to be a rapper and I answered - but not WHAT whom.
Person - Ok who is that inspires you to be a rapper then.
I said, Well it's not quite a person he is another God the name of God? Marshall Bruce Mathers III or Eminem as you like, is this guy that makes me lift my head and move on when the going ta difficult, he helps me every minute of the day when I'm down, the only thing I do is for the songs to touch him because I know that your music helped me and raise up and speak: want to know fuck all that shit hehehe. Thank you Marshall for having made my world a happy place will always be here for you.
